title: Simple Seafood Stew
directions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions, celery, carrots and fennel bulb. Sauté for 5 minutes.
Add garlic, chili flake, ½ tsp kosher salt and ¼ tsp of fresh black pepper to the vegetables; stir until aromatic, about 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and stock; bring to a simmer and reduce heat to medium low.

Simmer for 30 minutes, uncovered. 5 minutes before serving add the fresh thyme leaves and 1 TBSP of fennel fronds to the stew. Turn the heat up to medium and gently place the defrosted scallops into the stew.
Simmer until scallops are cooked, about 5 minutes. Adjust seasoning and serve with your favorite bread and butter.
ingredients: 1 bulb of fennel, sliced (fronds reserved to season the soup before serving)
2 cups fish stock or vegetable stock
Kosher salt and fresh black pepper to taste
12 oz. package of Bristol Fair Trade Scallops, defrosted
